name: Sheep Thrills
description:
Sheep Thrills is a 2D top-down racing puzzle game in which the player controls a horde of sheep that are constantly eating and growing. 

But don't underestimate the quantity of your sheep, because each stomach must be filled, otherwise your dream of a large flock will burst into nothingness.

Made during frankengamejam 2021 at Medienwissenschaft Bayreuth:

NicProgrammingDanielProgrammingLukeLevel DesignLaura ArtAnnie ArtGregorArt; Sound DesignRoseManagementAllVoice Acting; Project Planning

Sheap eat, delete and repeat.
